lead_paragraph: For a franchise with three NBA championships in the past decade and a 27-game winning streak along the way, putting together four consecutive victories might seem insignificant.

headline.print_headline: Heat Win Season-Best 4th Straight, Top Hawks 105-87
headline.main: Heat Win Season-Best 4th Straight, Top Hawks 105-87
